user.title: Create a Magic Area
user.description: Choose the area you would like to make it magic!

abort.invalid_area: The selected area does not exist
abort.no_more_areas: All your areas are already magic!

select_features.title: Feature selection
select_features.description: Select the features you want to enable for this area. Each feature will be configured in subsequent steps.

feature_conf_presence_hold.title: Presence Hold
feature_conf_presence_hold.description: Creates a switch that will hold an area occupied while it's on

data.presence_hold_timeout: Time after the switch will be automatically turned off. (0 = timeout disabled).

feature_conf_area_aware_media_player.title: Feature: Area aware media player
feature_conf_area_aware_media_player.description: Configure the area aware media player feature

data.notification_devices: Media Player devices used for broadcasting
data.notification_states: Play notifications devices only when on these states

data.aggregates_min_entities: Minimum number of entities of the same device class required to create aggregates.

data.turn_on_state: State to turn on the climate group.

feature_conf_advanced_light_groups.title: Advanced light states
feature_conf_advanced_light_groups.description: More settings for controlling the lights.

data.presence_device_platforms: Platforms to be used for presence sensing
data.bright_state_check: State of bright state entity (for on)
data.bright_lights: The lights to control in the bright mode
data.sleep_state_check: State of sleep state entity (for on)
data.sleep_lights: The lights to control in the sleep mode
data.accented_state_check: State of sleep state entity (for on)
data.accented_lights: The lights to control in the accented mode
data.clear_lights: The lights to control in the clear mode
data.occupied_lights: The lights to control in the occupied mode
data.extended_lights: The lights to control in the extended mode
data.accented_entity: Entity used to put area into accented when occupied
data.accented_state_dim: Dim level to use when the area is accented (0 for off)
data.clear_state_dim: Dim level to use when the area is clear (0 for off)
data.extended_state_dim: Dim level to use when the area is extended (0 for off)

area_config.title: Area options
area_config.description: Configure basic options for the area.

data.clear_timeout: How long since last presence event should it wait before clearing the area
data.extended_timeout: How after occupied the area should be extended
data.bright_entity: Entity used to put area into bright when occupied
data.bright_state_dim: Dim level to use when the area is bright (0 for off)
data.sleep_entity: Entity used to put area into sleep when occupied
data.sleep_state_dim: Dim level to use when the area is sleep (0 for off)
data.occupied_state_dim: Dim level to use when the area is occupied (0 for off)
